DOC.brief_summary: This double-blind , randomize , placebo-controlled study evaluate efficacy safety high-frequency ( 20Hz ) rTMS apply right dorsolateral prefrontal cortex 6 week . The primary objective evaluate change PTSD symptom six week high-frequency rTMS treatment measure Clinician Administered PTSD Scale ( CAPS ) active control group .
DOC.brief_title: High Frequency Repetitive Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation ( rTMS ) Treatment Post-traumatic Stress Disorder ( PTSD )
DOC.criteria: Signed Patient Information Consent . Patients primary PostTraumatic Stress Disorder ( diagnose MINI ) DSM IV TR . Patients CAPS score least 40 . Males females 1865 year age . Patients take PTSD pharmacotherapy least last 2 week prior commence study take PTSD pharmacotherapy must stable least 6 week prior start change 6 week study treatment phase . Individual group supportive psychotherapy may continue study allow start new psychotherapy 6 week study treatment phase . Current primary Axis I disorder include Schizophrenia , Bipolar Disorder type I , Major Depressive Disorder . Other primary Axis I disorder , opinion investigator , may affect outcome study . Patients HDRS score ≥ 18 . A metallic implant cranium ( except mouth ) . Patients severe unstable medical condition , opinion investigator would interfere progress safety . ECT treatment within last three month . Patients history epilepsy . Patients neurological disorder lead increase intracranial pressure . Patients severe cardiac disorder intracardiac line pacemaker . Patients current suicide risk ≥ 6 point MINI .
